body:
Hello, 


I would like to know how to perform the installation of both radiance and daysim softwares. I could download the binary files for each software, however I'm not able to use them since they are not in a friendly format and I'm not really sure about what to do with those files. I assume that I need another software that works as an interface but I'm not really strong/sure on how to do it. I'm developing a building project with trnsys and I will really appreciate your help. 


Best regards, 


Marcel 


Ps: I don't know if what I'm asking is really stupid or not...I'm not really a computer geek :)
